targets.query: SELECT mean("house_home_consumption_covered_by_solar_generator") AS ""a"", mean("house_home_consumption_covered_by_grid") FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_yield"), 1d) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_yield"), 1d) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_yield"), 30d) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_self_consumption_rate"), 30d) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30d) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_yield"), 1d) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("stats_total_yield"), 1mo) FROM "pvwr" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1mo) fill(null)
